item.description:
It's time for another dim sum outing and more... We will start off the day with a delicious lunch at the China Pearl in Chinatown. Afterwards we'll walk over to the Fort Point Channel Open Art Studios near South Station for an art-inspired afternoon.

We will meet on the 2nd floor of China Pearl at 11:30 am. Please be on time. If you do arrive late, please look for us either on the 2nd floor or the VIP room on the 3rd floor.

Free parking is available for the Open studios in the Central Parking Lot across from 249 A street. Please enter the lot from Binford Street, off of A Street.

For further information on the art walk, visit the following site:
http://www.fortpointa...
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the reservation under Amanda

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum/Art Walk
